original_text: And he saith unto them, Are ye so without understanding also? Do ye not perceive, that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man, it cannot defile him;
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 너희도 이렇게 깨달음이 없느냐 무엇이든지 밖에서 들어가는 것이 능히 사람을 더럽게 하지 못함을 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: Are ye so without understanding also?
that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man

sentences.korean_translation: 그를 더럽게 할 수 없다는 것을
